description.en:
1. Doping / Do Ping! (Doピング!)); Comic Megastore H 2009-02
Unable to "Get it up," Kenji orders a "male enhancement" drug from questionable website. The only problem is, when the time came, Kasumi drank it by mistake.
2. A Pleasurable Hot Spring / Onsen Satisfaction (OnSen サティスファクション); Comic Megastore 2009-05
After being rejected dozens of times by his sensei, Yagi goes for a full assult in the onsen during a school trip.


    
3-4. Cross X Family

5. What You Want to Do : Can't Say Out Load / Shitai Koto: Ienai Koto (シタイコト： イエナイコト); Comic Megastore H 2011-04
Natsume was born into a well off family but cannot speak her own mind, and it takes Shindou her attendant to force it out of her.


6-7. A Captive Voice / Toriko Voice (虜ボイス); Comic Megastore H 2010-07, 2011-02
The Class president of the Literature club has a quiet and beautiful voice. However, every time she talks to Takase it is misunderstood as a public display of affection; though, that assumption isn't necessarily false either.


8. Toriko Voice -Otomari Hen- (虜ボイス -お泊り編-).

9. A Hell of a Bride / Tentekiteki Hanayome (天敵的花嫁); Comic Megastore H 2010-11
Crippled by a past experience, Kanetsugu developed gynophobia. However, Kasuga, a marriage partner chosen by his mother, might just be able to cure him.

10. Fluorescence Filter / Keikou Filter (蛍光フィルタ); Comic Megastore H 2011-07
While at first glance their age gap may denote a mother and her son, Mitsuhiko and Hotaru are quite different. A woman and a boy, equally inexperienced and innocent.

11. Sweetitivity / Koinaka (かんじゅせい)
Sae is popular and loves sweets. She receives a lot of chocolates on Valentine’s Day. Her boyfriend Mutsuki is just the opposite; he doesn’t get any. Sae senses his unhappiness and decides to give him a present to lift his spirits on their way home.

12. The Life of A Shameless Beauty / Hibi no Itonami (卑美の営み); COMIC HOTMiLK 2011-10
13. Hot Love Conduct / Netsuai Conduct (ネツアイコンダクト, Hot Love Conduct); COMIC HOTMiLK 2012-02
14. Summer Bloom / Shochuu Kaika (暑中開花); COMIC Megastore 2010-09
After being told by Akira that he loves her comforting scent, Himawari becomes self-conscious about her smell after practice (though she has nothing to worry about as far as Akira's concerned).

15. Hachiya's Attack! / Hachiya-san no Kougeki! (はちやさん　の　こうげき！); COMIC HOTMiLK 2012-07
